item.description: We’ll dance the night away to the music of our DJ Rockin’ Ron. There will be a delicious buffet 8 to 9:30 pm for you to enjoy. Bring your friends with you. Dress to impress and door prizes. Admission $15. For info, call Gail at 860-582-8229. Directions to 164 Central St.: I 84 to Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), go to end and turn right, at 2nd light look for facility on right. Sponsored by Social Connections.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the admission's table.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles St. Patrick's Dance
